languages.text: Холодный пол под вашими коленями, возня служек в отдалении и — больше ничего. Скука быстро одолевает вас.
The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.
languages.original_text: Холодный пол под вашими коленями, возня служек в отдалении и — больше ничего. Скука быстро одолевает вас.

traits.locale_text: Cold floor under your knees, altar servers fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. Boredom overtakes you quickly.
Cold floor under your knees, altar servers fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. Boredom overtakes you quickly.
The cold floor under your knees, acolytes fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.
The cold floor under your knees, acolytes fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.
The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.
The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.

languages.text: Le sol froid sous vos genoux. Des initiés qui s'agitent un peu plus loin. Et rien d'autre. Très vite, l'ennui vous gagne.
languages.original_text: The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.

traits.locale_text: Le sol froid sous vos genoux. Des initiés qui s'agitent un peu plus loin. Et rien d'autre. Très vite, l'ennui vous gagne.

languages.text: Sientes el frío suelo bajo tus rodillas, a los iniciados moviéndose a lo lejos... y nada más. El aburrimiento no tarda en apoderarse de tu mente.
languages.original_text: The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.

traits.locale_text: Sientes el frío suelo bajo tus rodillas, a los iniciados moviéndose a lo lejos... y nada más. El aburrimiento no tarda en apoderarse de tu mente.

languages.text: 你只感觉到了膝盖下冰冷的地板，还有远处忙碌的助祭，除此之外别无他物。没过多久，你就开始觉得无聊了。
languages.original_text: The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.

traits.locale_text: 你只感觉到了膝盖下冰冷的地板，还有远处忙碌的助祭，除此之外别无他物。没过多久，你就开始觉得无聊了。

languages.text: 膝の下の冷たい床が、遠くを見回すことを誘導した。だが、何もなかったため、すぐに退屈に襲われた。
languages.original_text: The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.

traits.locale_text: 膝の下の冷たい床が、遠くを見回すことを誘導した。だが、何もなかったため、すぐに退屈に襲われた。

languages.text: Der kalte Boden unter deinen Füßen, Eingeweihte, die sich irgendwo in der Ferne bewegen — und sonst nichts. Du wirst schnell von der Langeweile übermannt.
languages.original_text: The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.

traits.locale_text: Der kalte Boden unter deinen Füßen, Eingeweihte, die sich irgendwo in der Ferne bewegen — und sonst nichts. Du wirst schnell von der Langeweile übermannt.

languages.text: Dizlerinin altındaki soğuk zemin, etraftakilerin tökezlemelerine neden olmaktan fazlasını yapmıyor. Üzerine hızla sıkıntı çöküyor.
languages.original_text: The cold floor under your knees, initiates fumbling around in the distance — and nothing else. You are quickly overcome with boredom.
